ContentBrand.Description: For best results, use an image that is at least 100x100 pixels and no more than 4MB in size. Accepted file formats are PNG, JPEG, or GIF (non-animated).
ContentBrand.ImageGuidelines: For best results, use an image that is at least 320x100 pixels and no more than 4MB in size. Accepted file formats are PNG, JPEG, or GIF (non-animated).
ContentBrand.MerchandiseImageGuidelines: For best results, use an image that is at least 500x500 pixels and no more than 4MB in size. Accepted file formats are PNG or GIF (non-animated).

ContentSettings.ContentNameChangeGuidelines: The content name can be changed once every three months. After the change, the content name visible to users will be updated once the review is completed.
ContentSettings.contentNameChangeRequest:
The content name change request is currently under review. 
Once approved, the name will be updated. Additionally, after the change, it cannot be modified again for three months.
ContentSettings.NameChangeRequest: Submitted a request to change the content name!
ContentSettings.NameChangeCompletion: The name will be changed once the review is completed. Please note that the review process may take up to one week.
ContentSettings.ChangeContentNameGuidelines: You can change the name of the content. A review is required after the change, and if approved, the name will be updated. Once changed, the name cannot be modified again for 3 months.
ContentSettings.EditDescription: You can freely edit the description of the content.
ContentSettings.SetDefaultLicense: Set the default license for each DigitalItem.
ContentSettings.SetDefaultCopyrightHolders: Set the default copyright holders for each DigitalItem.
ContentSettings.DiscardChanges: Do you want to discard the changes?

ContentReview.ReviewMessage: This page will become accessible after the review is completed.
ContentReview.AdditionalDocuments: In some cases, you may be required to submit additional documents.
ContentReview.ApplicationReturned: Your application has been returned for revisions.
ContentReview.ReviewProcessIdentified: The review process identified issues that require your attention.
ContentReview.ReviseAndResubmit: Please revise the highlighted fields below and resubmit your application.
